alert.note: Alert for Catahoula (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 8:28AM CDT until June 26 at 9:15AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Catahoula Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 915 AM CDT. * At 828 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rosefield, or 13 miles south of Columbia, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sherwood, Enterprise and Aimwell around 840 AM CDT. Harrisonburg and Wallace Ridge around 855 AM CDT. Sicily Island around 905 AM CDT. Lee Bayou around 915 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
